bibl.title: The Dura Parchment and the Diatessaron.
bibl.note: P. Dura 10 (= van Haelst 699). - Introduction. - History of research. - Methodological remarks. - The harmonistic sequence of Dura. - Other Tatianic features. - Non-Tatianic features. - Conclusion.
